alert.note: Alert for Morrison; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Stearns and southwestern Morrison Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Upsala, or 15 miles southwest of Little Falls, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Upsala around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Anthony, Albany and Holdingford. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota near mile marker 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
